titles.title: Am I A Soldier Of The Cross (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the name (In the name) The precious name (The precious name) Of Him who died for Me Through grace I'll win The promised crown Whate'er my cross may be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Am I a soldier of the cross A follow'r of the Lamb And shall I fear to own His cause Or blush to speak His name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Must I be carried to the skies On flow'ry beds of ease While others fought to win the prize And sailed thro' bloody seas{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Are there no foes for me to face Must I not stem the flood Is this vile world a friend to grace To help me on to God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Since I must fight if I would reign Increase my courage Lord I'll bear the toil endure the pain Supported by Thy word{/lang-eng}
